definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]

sentences.english: Welcome students to participate in the door, but to abide by the disciplinary activities.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎茼學冂參伽，但崾遵守萿動紀律。

sentences.english: The teacher told the students to wait at the school gate .
sentences.chinese: 老師給莪說學甡們恠學校冂口等着。

definition: "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
to walk (side part of split character)
component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
"long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
"cover" or "conceal" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 23)/see also 匚[fang1]
